description:
Welcome to the world of bootstrap. Bootstrap is amazing framework which saves us ton of time. Bootstrap is responsive so means our websites will work on every device we through in. If you just getting started in bootstrap or want to learn more then this is a perfect course for you.

This course divided into 3 sections

  1. Learning how bootstrap classes and grid system works.
  2. Creating a bootstrap style website.
  3. Creating a custom website using bootstrap.


  1. Learning how bootstrap classes and grid system works
  • Container, container fluid and navbars.
  • Grid system, buttons and icons.
  • Dropdowns, custom content and jumbotron.
  • Breadcrumbs, Pagination and Badges.


2. Creating a bootstrap style website

  • Navigation
  • Jumbotron
  • Custom content
  • footer


3. Creating a custom website using bootstrap

  • Responsive Navigation
  • Responsive Billboard
  • Responsive Images
  • Responsive Footer


After completing this course you'll have complete understanding how bootstrap works and how you can customize it.
title: Learn Bootstrap - Make Websites Superfast!
